segments.text: I haven't met you at the gym for a long time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yeah , I quit my job , and started working from home . Recently I've got a project to deal with and don't have much time to work out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: why ? You have a decent salary , lots of promotion opportunities and a regular life of going to the office at 9 o ' clock and coming back home at 5 in the evening .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: it's not about pay raise or promotion . You know , I hate getting up early in the morning and coming back home late at night .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: then SOHO is your ideal work style .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yeah , as long as I have a computer and internet access , I can start working . I recently enjoy working in my own place and at my own pace .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: and you don't have to work under that much pressure and control .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: absolutely . I can decide when and what to do all by myself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: sounds great . Are there many business opportunity ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yeah , I can find enough online .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: it's good to have business around . But you should also do some exercise to keep fit .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: thank you for reminding me . I'll continue to exercise as soon as I finish this project .
segments.speaker: S2
